about_the_game:
Forge Your Unique Colony


Step into Colony, a captivating blend of survival and strategy games. Craft your destiny by building, surviving, and embarking on epic voyages of exploration. Your choices shape not only your colony but also the world around it. Prepare for a journey of creation and discovery!

What Awaits You


Imagine a realm where your colony thrives and grows – that's Colony. In this game, you gather resources, create vital tools, and safeguard your people. Rise as a leader, where choices reverberate and growth knows no bounds. Kindness or assertiveness, alliances or uncharted territories – your decisions drive your destiny. Can you and your allies cultivate the most extraordinary colony?

Expand Your Horizons




Amidst lush forests and serene waters, you'll uncover the art of survival. But the wilderness isn't your only canvas. Explore new islands, each a treasure trove of resources waiting to be harnessed. Venture on boats, casting your net across uncharted seas. Every island offers unique treasures – your journey towards prosperity.

Logistics and Trade




The expansion brings a new challenge – transportation. Establish logistical networks to transport resources across islands. Build harbors for efficient trade and resource exchange. Every island's strengths complement the other's weaknesses, creating a dynamic ecosystem of prosperity.

Diverse Structures




Craft diverse structures – from bustling factories to steadfast defenses. Factories hum with life as workers craft wares. Logistic hubs and repositories secure resources, while defenses guard against rival colonies' ambitions.

Inhabitants of Your Colony




Your colony thrives with its inhabitants. Each brings unique strengths and skills. Assign roles to maximize efficiency and harmony within your bustling settlement.

Engage in Strategic Warfare


Conquer and defend as rivals emerge. Assemble forces, devise strategies, and command from above. Vigilant defenses become your stronghold.

Forge Bonds for Triumph




Enlist up to 4 players to fortify your colony. Researchers, warriors, and more – companions enrich your journey.

Ready to Build Your Legacy?


Embrace the Colony adventure – a tale of growth, leadership, and exploration. Join the journey, shape your colony, and immerse yourself in a world of possibilities. Add Colony to your wishlist now!
